quote.text: You can't out-train a bad diet

about.title: Transform Your Life Through Fitness
about.subtitle: Building Stronger Bodies, Building Better Lives

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: We're more than just a gym - we're a community dedicated to helping you achieve your fitness goals. Our expert trainers and state-of-the-art facilities provide everything you need to build strength, improve health, and boost confidence.

story.title: Our Story
story.content: Founded in 2015, we began with a simple vision: to create a fitness center that puts people first. What started as a small personal training studio has grown into a comprehensive fitness facility that maintains the personal touch we're known for

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from our training programs to our facility maintenance

values.title: Community
values.description: We foster a supportive community where everyone feels welcome and motivated

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We continuously evolve our methods and equipment to provide the best fitness experience

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: We're here to help you start your fitness journey
contact.description: Have questions about our services or ready to begin your fitness journey? Reach out to us and our team will be happy to assist you
